      • confirm

        @PutMapping(value="/confirm/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> confirm(@PathVariable
                                                                                                           int id,
                                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                           java.lang.String origin)
                                                                                                    throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                                                                                                           ResourceCannotUpdateException
        Initiate user confirmation and send confirmation email.
        Parameters:
        id - the user identifier.
        origin - the confirmation link origin.
        Returns:
        no content.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user could not found.
        ResourceCannotUpdateException - if could not sent email.
